message:
前记：我上一个Win10吐槽也是因为索引100%硬盘占用（疯狂索引我EVE的资源文件），难道我和搜索有仇？

玩狒狒14觉得网有点卡，决定重启电脑，结果搜索白屏了
本来Win10的开始菜单就够难用了？搜索还坏了？


其他来源：

Windows Search down for many, showing a blank box instead of search results
https://www.windowscentral.com/w ... tead-search-results

Windows 10 search bar not working after rebuilding index and tried everything
https://www.reddit.com/r/Windows ... _not_working_after/

都是这两小时内发的贴

更新：破案了。据说是Bing坏了，然后Search优先联网检索内容，网连不上就傻X了，在注册表内屏蔽Bing解决。所以我随便搜什么内容微软都要发到Bing上去瞅瞅的吗？

给急用的提供workaround:
Windows Registry Editor Version 5.00

[HKEY_CURRENT_USER\Software\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Search]
"CortanaConsent"=dword:00000000
"BingSearchEnabled"=dword:00000000

第一句关掉cortana，第二句关掉bing，要开回来的话自己改回1

再更新：微软自称解决了
We are aware of a temporary server-side issue causing Windows search to show a blank box. This issue has been resolved for most users and in some cases, you might need to restart your device. We are working diligently to fully resolve the issue and will provide an update once resolved.
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us ... -message-center#387
但我也不准备开回在线服务了，反正真的要搜东西也是手动 FF + Google
title: 好了，今天也要轮到我吐槽辣鸡Win10了
userSign: (Death is the gateway to Eternity, my dear.)
